name: Akashic Code
description:
Description

Akashic Code is (a very early prototype of) a game set in a space opera universe where you (will) control a female sniper sometimes followed by the ghost of a fallen soldier. Her goal is to complete missions/contracts given by a mysterious employer.

How did I came up with this ? (In case you're wondering...)

I started by generating ideas with an online website to give me the following data :

  • Genre : Survival x Rythm
  • Rule : 1 HP
  • Setting : Space Opera
  • Theme : Rich vs. Poor

That gave me a simple base to expand upon. Just for fun I then looked up for a Text Generator AI to get a storyline for the game and by picking the best part I got an interesting synopsis.

To complete the idea, I then generated a name for the game.

For the visual style of this prototype I followed Leon Stansfield's "How to make 3D Pixel Art in Godot!" (and also his grass rendering video) using a palette by Joao Vasconcelos on Lospec.

"What can I do in this prototype ?"

I will update this section of the game page if I ever continue this project.

As of now, you can move your character in a simple debug scene with some trees, grass and water. There is no real gameplay for the moment being.

Conclusion

Thanks for everyone who made the tools/websites that helped me build this game idea. Thanks to randy for giving me the will to upload this unfinished project.

If you're interested, feel free to share ideas for the project, or ask me for collaboration. If this game is abandoned and you want to continue it, feel free to ask me too.
